title: Blowpipe
summaries: The Blowpipe is a ranged weapon that auto-fires Seeds and Darts as ammunition. When a Blowpipe is in a player's inventory, there is a chance that any vegetation growing on normal grass blocks will yield some Seeds. Flowers growing in Clay Pots and Planter Boxes can also yield Seeds. Both wild and cultivated flowers typically drop 4 Seeds at a time; tall grass typically drops 1â€“2 Seeds.
The Blowpipe can be found randomly in <linked>Wooden Chests</linked> near the <linked>Surface</linked> or in the <linked>Underground</linked> <linked>layer</linked>.
